H0.text: Which old English coin was equal to four pence. Penny

H1.text: Which old English coin was equal to four pence. Farthing

H2.text: Which old English coin was equal to four pence. Shilling

H3.text: Which old English coin was equal to four pence. Groat

A4.text: The groat is the traditional name of a defunct English and Irish silver coin worth four pence.
